titleStmt.title: An alarm to the vvorld, of the appearing of Sions king. Or, a brief discoverie of the foot-steps of the Lord upon earth.
titleStmt.author: Banaster, Thomas.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Giles Calvert, at the Black-spred-eagle at the West-end of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
